title: I need a 3D jewellery designer who can produce stl file for our floral collection.
snippet:
We are a Hong Kong based jeweler and are looking for 3D jewelry designers who are creative and stylish; at the same time they can produce stl file for production. We want to create a floral collection with necklace, earrings and bracelet, and if my team likes it, we would consider you for future projects.

We may also invite you to shoot a video on your shooting device, perhaps camera/mobile would be good to share your design concept to be posted in our social media platforms, facebook and instagram with near 10K followers in total.

Please contact us by sharing your profile and design portfolio for us to consider if your style matches with our brand. 

Thank you!
